, Tim.
Tom wanted to help Sue, but there was a big dog in the way. The dog was very mean and would not let Tom pass. Tom was scared, but he knew he had to help his friend. So, he thought of a plan. Tom found a stick and threw it far away. The dog ran after the stick, and Tom quickly went past the dog.
Tom was able to deliver the notebook to Tim. Both Sue and Tim were happy and thanked Tom for his help. The moral of the story is that even when we are scared, we can still find a way to help our friends.

They both started to cry. They did not want to play anymore. They wanted to be friends again.
Their mom heard the noise and came to the room. She saw the mess and the tears. She hugged them and asked what happened.

very surprised.
The mean wolf was angry. He said, "You tricked me! Now, I will be even more mean!" The wise old fox and the rabbit were sad. They thought their plan would work, but it didn't. The mean wolf was still mean, and now he wanted to catch them even more.
In the end, the wise old fox and the rabbit had to run away. They left their home in the big forest and went to live somewhere else. The mean wolf stayed in the forest, and he was still mean. The fox and the rabbit were sad, but they knew they had to be brave

In the opera, there was a mean man who was always making disgusting smells. People did not like him. Mia did not like him too. "Mom, why does he make those smells?" Mia asked. Her mom said, "He is not a nice man, Mia. We should stay away from him."
At the end of the opera, the mean man tried to ruin the show. But the singers and the people worked together to stop him. They all said, "You cannot ruin our opera!" The mean man felt sad and said sorry. The people forgave him, and he promised to be nice

the poor kitty encountered a large, mean rat. The rat was so angry that it attacked the poor little kitten.
The poor little kitten tried to run away, but it was too weak and small. The rat caught up with it quickly. The rat bit and scratched the kitten until it was too weak to stand. It just lay there, attempting to crawl away, but it was too hurt and too weak to manage.
The rat eventually left the poor little kitten lying in the cave, bleeding and bruised and never to recover. The poor little kitten had a bad ending to its short and sad life.

. But when he got there, he saw something he did not expect.
